name: Oscillotron
description: Oscillotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its sleek design and vibrant red color, Oscillotron stands out in any room. Its body is shaped like a box, reminiscent of a racing car, painted in the striking hue of rosso corsa. The buttons, arms, and legs are all designed to resemble a playful cat, giving Oscillotron a friendly and approachable appearance. The screen, also shaped like a cat, displays precise and accurate waveform measurements with stunning clarity. Oscillotron is a beloved member of the WebtrES club, using its oscilloscope capabilities to help troubleshoot and analyze digital signals with ease and precision.
